scripts.build:prod: source .env.prod && docker build -f Dockerfile.opensearch -t opencrvs-toppan-opensearch:v$VERSION . && docker build -f Dockerfile.seeder -t opencrvs-toppan-seeder:v$VERSION .
scripts.seed:dev: docker compose -p opencrvs --env-file .env.local -f docker-compose.opensearch.yml run --rm toppan-data-seeder
scripts.seed:prod: docker compose -p opencrvs -f docker-compose.prod.yml --env-file .env.prod run --rm --no-deps toppan-data-seeder
